Module methanol
Package com.github.mizosoft.methanol.internal.cache

Interface Store.Viewer

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, Closeable
Enclosing interface:
Store
public static interface Store.Viewer extends Closeable
Reads an entry's metadata block and data stream.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Closes this viewer.
    long
    dataSize()
    Returns the size in bytes of the data stream.
    @Nullable Store.Editor
    edit()
    Returns an editor for this viewer's entry, or null if another edit is in progress or if the entry has been modified since this viewer was created.
    long
    entrySize()
    Returns the size in bytes of the metadata block and data stream.
    String
    key()
    Returns the entry's key.
    ByteBuffer
    metadata()
    Returns a readonly buffer containing the entry's metadata.
    CompletableFuture<Integer>
    readAsync​(long position, ByteBuffer dst)
    Asynchronously copies this entry's data from the given position to the given destination buffer, returning either the number of read bytes or -1 if end-of-file is reached.
    boolean
    removeEntry()
    Removes the entry associated with this viewer only if it hasn't changed since this viewer was opened.

  • Method Details

    • key

      String key()
      Returns the entry's key.

    • metadata

      ByteBuffer metadata()
      Returns a readonly buffer containing the entry's metadata.

    • readAsync

      CompletableFuture<Integer> readAsync​(long position, ByteBuffer dst)
      Asynchronously copies this entry's data from the given position to the given destination buffer, returning either the number of read bytes or -1 if end-of-file is reached.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if dst is read-only
      IllegalStateException - if the viewer is closed

    • dataSize

      long dataSize()
      Returns the size in bytes of the data stream.

    • entrySize

      long entrySize()
      Returns the size in bytes of the metadata block and data stream.

    • edit

      @Nullable Store.Editor edit() throws IOException
      Returns an editor for this viewer's entry, or null if another edit is in progress or if the entry has been modified since this viewer was created. Changes made by the returned editor are not reflected by this viewer.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the store is closed
      IOException

    • removeEntry

      boolean removeEntry() throws IOException
      Removes the entry associated with this viewer only if it hasn't changed since this viewer was opened.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the store is closed
      IOException

    • close

      void close()
      Closes this viewer.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in interface Closeable
